comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
T.G. Ellyson  (Aero Club of America Pilot # 28   June 2, 1911)
December 24, 1910  Assigned by Acting Secretary of the Navy , Beekman Winthrop, to take a course in Aviation instruction under Glenn Curtiss.
 January 29, 1911   First flight   San Diego, California.
